name: Christmas Tree
description: A large, decorated tree for the holiday season.

name: Ornaments
description: Decorative items to hang on the Christmas tree.

name: Lights
description: String lights to decorate the tree and house.

name: Tinsel
description: Shiny strips of material to add sparkle to the tree.

name: Stockings
description: Large socks to hang by the fireplace for gifts.

name: Wreath
description: A circular arrangement of flowers and leaves for decoration.

name: Bows
description: Decorative ribbons to put on gifts.

name: Candles
description: Scented candles to create a festive atmosphere.

name: Santa Hat
description: A red hat with a white trim, worn by Santa Claus.
